Title: Relates to removing the requirement that student without a lawful immigration status must file an affidavit committing to obtaining a lawful immigration status
Summary: Removes the requirement that a student without a lawful immigration status must file an affidavit committing to obtaining a lawful immigration status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to removing the requirement that a student without a lawful immigration status must file an affidavit committing to obtaining a lawful immigration status
